about.summary: parallel graph management and execution in heterogeneous computing

name: pathos
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: pathos
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: pathos-0.2.0.tgz
  url: https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/1d/a0/e5107f85bcb397c82ee875d005d88a537d4fdc1d1498f34bb15dfba7ca49/pathos-0.2.0.tgz
  md5: 3e75bd626c4c16a60aa78d9f35de6cfb

build:
  number: 1
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - ppft >=1.6.4.5
    - dill >=0.2.5
    - pox >=0.2.2
    - multiprocess >=0.70.4

  run:
    - python
    - ppft >=1.6.4.5
    - dill >=0.2.5
    - pox >=0.2.2
    - multiprocess >=0.70.4

test:
  imports:
    - pathos
    - pathos.helpers
    - pathos.secure
    - pathos.xmlrpc

about:
  home: http://trac.mystic.cacr.caltech.edu/project/pathos/wiki.html
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: parallel graph management and execution in heterogeneous computing

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jschueller
